```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
library(learnr)
library(gradethis)

virtualenv_path <- "./venv/learnr_py"
# get the system python interpreter; pip, venv and virtualenv modules need to be installed for this:
#   apt install python3-pip python3-venv python3-virtualenv
# can pass a Python version to require, e.g. version = "3.10"
python_path <- virtualenv_starter(version = "3.10")
python_dependencies <- c('numpy', 'pandas', 'scikit-learn', 'scipy')

virtualenv_create(virtualenv_path, python = python_path)
virtualenv_install(virtualenv_path, packages = python_dependencies)
use_virtualenv(virtualenv_path, required = TRUE)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

gradethis_setup()
```
